Html:
Hi
What is your timely plan for version 1.5 and 2.0 release.

thanks

There will be a CTP available at the end of the month. This will have several new controls but not all of the new controls. There will be a second CTP at the end of December. This CTP will have all the version 1.5 controls available. The first beta will be mid January with a production release around the end of February. Version 2 will start shortly after that. Unfortunately all these dates are relative to my day jobs work load. Iâ€™m hoping my work load will be much lower than it has been for the last three months.

Thanks,
Scott
